data.comment: The match is underway. QPR have kicked-off.
Jason McCarthy has the misfortune to make it 0-1 through an own goal.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Adams Park.
The second-half is underway. Wycombe with the kick-off.
Joe Jacobson (Wycombe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Garath McCleary with Fred Onyedinma. This is the first substitution made today by Gareth Ainsworth.
Uche Ikpeazu is replacing Scott Kashket for Wycombe at Adams Park.
Anis Mehmeti is on a sub for Nick Freeman for Wycombe.
In the minute 76, Chris Willock is replacing Tom Carroll for the away team.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a second substitution, with Macauley Bonne replacing Ilias Chair.
Ryan Allsop for Wycombe has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Goal! Anis Mehmeti levels the match at 1-1.
Niko Hamalainen (QPR) gets a yellow card.
